assignments.description: This is a testing aid - it will appear in the debug report at the end of the flow - it does no harm so it can be left in for normal production. If debugging and you don't see this element and TRUE at the end something's wrong.
assignments.name: MarkFlowComplete
assignments.label: MarkFlowComplete

constants.description: Text will appear as Alert Text over a neutral background
constants.name: constDestructiveText

constants.description: The values identified here will be excluded from selection in ckbRefereeStatus
constants.name: ExcludedStatuses

value.stringValue: License Suspended, License Suspended - Safety Compliance, License Suspended - USRowing Admin

constants.description: The values added here will be excluded from from maintDesignations component select.
constants.name: ExcludeRankDesignations

value.stringValue: Only Ranks that do not appear in the table above will appear here.
You can delete a Rank by removing the Start Date of a row and then pressing Submit.

Endorsements are similar to rank, but are not the same. You will see rank progression in the table as well as endorsements. A member of the corps may have several active endorsements in addition to their current rank.

decisions.description: This will return you to the beginning or simply terminate since there's no place to go
decisions.name: IfLoopBack
decisions.label: IfLoopBack

Flow.description: This flow presents ranks using Designation__c. Contact Rank is updated as a by-product of changes to Designation__c. This flow will ignore Endorsements.

formulas.description: Ranks do not necessarily equal designations. This will properly map rank to designation.
formulas.name: DetermineRankFromDesignation

Flow.label: Referee Status and Rank

recordLookups.description: User ID is needed to insert records into Designation
recordLookups.name: GetUser
recordLookups.label: GetUser

fields.name: AlertMessage
fields.fieldText:
You cannot remove the Rank Endorsement

{!LoopDesignationUpdts.Designation__c}. Please contact support for assistance.

fields.name: DisplayCkRankDesignationConfirmationMsg
fields.fieldText:
You did not check Confirm Rank Update.


If you want to update rank to {!ContactRecord.Referee_Rank__c}

click Previous and check Confirm Designation and Rank Update.


If you DO NOT wish to update status click Next.

fields.name: DisplayConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
You did not check Confirm Status Update.


If you want to update status to {!ContactRecord.Referee_Status__c}

click Previous and check Confirm Status Update.


If you DO NOT wish to update status click Next.

fields.name: RemoveDesignationMsg
fields.fieldText:
By removing the Start Date you will remove

{!LoopDesignationUpdts.Designation__c}!


Check the box below to confirm that you want this Rank removed before clicking Next to continue.

fields.name: DisplayDesignationRankConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
You've selected {!ContactRecord.Referee_Rank__c} as the new Rank.

Check Confirm Rank Update below before clicking Next to continue. .

fields.name: DisplayStatusUpdtConformation
fields.fieldText:
You've selected {!ContactRecord.Referee_Status__c} as the new Status.

Check Confirm Status Update below before clicking Next to continue.

fields.name: DisplayStatusChange
fields.fieldText:
The following is for diagnostic purposes:

ID: {!ContactRecord.Id}

Status: {!ContactRecord.Referee_Status__c}

fields.name: DisplayRefereeCandidateName
fields.fieldText:
Referee or Candidate Name

{!ContactRecord.Name}

[{!ContactRecord.Referee_Rank__c}]

fields.name: DisplayMsg
fields.fieldText: Pressing CANCEL [X] will discard any changes and return you to the lookup form.

fields.name: DisplayUpdtContactStatus
fields.fieldText:
It appears that you pressed Next without selecting a Referee or Candidate from the lookup selection.


Press Previous to return to make a selection.

fields.name: FiniDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Updates have been submitted


You may elect to Review Changes

-or-

Press Finish

value.stringValue: Search for a Referee or Candidate
